cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOvT&OQBNT.)CONFIDENTIAL.CABLN15T.AIR FORCE AT AIBSH,Paraphrase telegram frsaa the Resident Aden, to tha Secretary of State for the Colonies',, Dated 25th Novoirbar-.(Received Colonial Office p.m. 25th November 1$21.)Circulated by the Secretary of State for the Colonies.No, 72 of 25th November. The Royal Air Force flight at Aden has had an excellent Political effect. The relief of the recent border situation irae -srithout doubt largely due to the preaence of c-eroplanes. I consider an air force is indispensable in absence of a strong land force if we are to uphold our proper position... The centinuarnce .and-extensioii of their flights will restore and increase cur prestige and our influence over our own tribes and proportionately with Imam,RESIDENT.t
